# Welcome to the Intro to Python Workshop

This is the main webpage for the intro to python workshops! The workshops are geared towards R and SAS users who want to explore using Python. We will cover installing and setting up python with anaconda, basic python datastructures, and finally a demo logistic regression model with a cancer dataset. We will upload session videos, python demos and other things here.
